books.title: The Pragmatic Programmer
books.author: David Thomas & Andrew Hunt
books.notes: A classic that every developer should read. Great insights on craftsmanship.

books.title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
books.author: Martin Kleppmann
books.notes: The definitive guide to building reliable, scalable systems.

books.title: Staff Engineer
books.author: Will Larson
books.notes: Great perspectives on growing beyond senior roles.

books.title: A Philosophy of Software Design
books.author: John Ousterhout
books.notes: Complexity is the root of all evil. This book shows how to fight it.

books.title: The Mom Test
books.author: Rob Fitzpatrick
books.notes: Essential reading for anyone building products.

books.title: Working in Public
books.author: Nadia Eghbal
books.notes: Fascinating look at open source communities and maintainer burnout.

books.title: The Art of Doing Science and Engineering
books.author: Richard Hamming
